attributes.action: Strip Islamists of British nationality and deport them from the U.K. forthwith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To take British citizenship off any Islamic extremists, members of organizations such as al-muhajiroun or Hizb ut-tahrir, terrorists & terrorist sympathisers and deport them from the U.K.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
